packs.pack_description: Makes Hearts more visible when under the 'Wither' effect.
Changes the default green XP bar to a rainbow XP bar.
Adds a button to stack craft items in the inventory, crafting table, stonecutter, and trade faster with villagers.
Allows mobile users to easily tab and move between previous and next messages sent in chat and command blocks.
Adds a cheat sheet to the Brewing Stand interface.
Adds numbers to the hotbar slots.
Gives the inventory slot highlight the same texture as the hotbar selection slot
Changes all inventories and UIs to be darker.
Changes all inventories and UIs to be transparent.
Changes all inventories and UIs to be themed after Minecraft Java Edition's High Contrast pack.
Makes all locked trades visibles and allows to see the locked item names and enchantments.
Removes the 'How to Play' Button from all screens so you do not accidentally misclick it.
Adds the 'Bedrock Edition' subtitle to the Minecraft logo.
